= How can I contribute to this project? =
 # Use Al-Qalam
  * Download Al-Qalam from the Android Market
  * Manually download & install Al-Qalam from *[http://code.google.com/p/al-qalam/downloads/list Downloads]* section
 # Suggest [http://code.google.com/p/al-qalam/wiki/PlansForNextReleaseAkaVersion2 new features]
 # Report bugs
  * *[http://code.google.com/p/al-qalam/issues/list Report bugs]* you have detected
 # Commit code
  * First of all, build your *own* Al-Qalam
    # checkout the working copy of the project:
      {{{svn checkout http://al-qalam.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ al-qalam-read-only}}}
    # [http://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html Download] and [http://developer.android.com/sdk/installing.html install]
    # Create new project from existing source, i.e. from checked out Al-Qalam source
    # Build Al-Qalam and try test runs
  * Make your changes
  * Commit your changes
